51824.「ホホホ。女神の天桜石は\n 無事 光の河に捧げられたようじゃな。:
Hohoho. The Pink Goddess Gem seems to have
been safely dedicated to the River of Light.

51825.「さて 無心で 女神に祈るのじゃ。: Now, pray to the goddess with all your heart.

51829.<center>永き時を経て 異界の地で\n魔瘴のチカラを その身に宿せし魔族が:
After a long time, a demon miasma power
appeared in the land of the other world and
came to be known as the "King of Demons.

51830.<center>魔の王のチカラは 六聖陣をも圧倒し\nついに 聖戦に敗れる時が来:
The Demon King's power overwhelmed even the
Six Saints, and time came for him to be
defeated in holy war.

51831.<center>六聖陣は かろうじて 逃げのびたが\nこの敗北は 地上への魔瘴の:
The Six Saints barely escaped, but their
defeat would end up allowing the demon miasma
to invade the earth.

51832.<center>もはや 六聖陣と その従者だけでは\nアストルティアを守ることの:
The time has come when the Six Saints and
their followers are no longer enough to
protect Astoltia.
